title: Potion Flask
completion_text: Well done! You can change the color of your potion by setting potionColor to whatever you want. The clear glass you made with opacity(white, .4) will give it a cool effect, whatever color you choose.

steps.hint: We want solid shapes for this challenge, so **tape** `stroke 0`
For a dark look, lets set `background charcoal`
If we want to change our potion color we can set it to a variable. To do that **tape** `potionColor = purple`
Let’s move into position with `move 0, 50`
And set la couleur de dessin with `color potionColor`
Finally, we can draw the potion with `circle 90`
Our potion is going to go up the neck of the flask, and we will use a line. Définis up the line style with `stroke potionColor, 40`
And draw the line up from the middle with `line 0, -120`.
Définis the stroke back to zero for the flask’s glass. **Tape** `stroke 0`
Let’s add in un autre cercle to give our potion a natural look. Déplace-toi vers la droite and up with `move 30, -30`.
Définis la couleur de dessin to a shade slightly darker than the potion color with `color darken(potionColor, 10)`
Finally, draw the circle with `circle 20`
Déplace-toi back to the center with `move -30, 30`
Définis the color for the glass flask with `color opacity(white, .4)`
Then draw the flask with an arc. **Tape** `arc 100, 1.4, 1.6`
See how the arc draws almost a complete circle, but leaves a nice flat top for us? Our flask neck will meet it there, but first we need to draw a cork behind the glass. **Tape** `move 0, -130`
Définis la couleur de dessin for the cork with `color tan`
And draw the cork with `polygon 20, 0, 30, -40, -30, -40, -20, 0`
Now for the neck, lets choose the see-through white color for our stroke. **Tape** `stroke 60, opacity(white, .4)`
Déplace-toi up just a little bit for the neck with `move 0, -25`
Finally, draw the neck with `line 0, 60`
